channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Billionaire MacKenzie Scott extends her philanthropy with a $17 million gift to Oklahoma’s oldest public community college, where most students rely on aid
item.description: MacKenzie Scott is continuing her giving streak to colleges, this time with a $17 million “life-changing” donation to Northern Oklahoma College.

item.title: 3 Smart Ways to Get Ahead of Your Competitors Now

item.title: Why your 401(k) is safe from a 40% crash in stocks—but not a 10% to 15% correction, top analyst says
item.description: "It would be kind of shocking if you didn't have some kind of profit-taking correction in 2026 at some point on the order of 10% to 15%."
